tag_line: Revolutionalizing the future with using 0's and 1's
subTitle: I don't just write code, I Solve Problems
favorites_quote: Willingness to take intelligient risks in the pursuit of your clearly defined goals, put you on a greater side of life. Enabling you to archive the same level of success in 1 or 2 years, which may take other people 10 or 20 years to archieve, if lessed focused.
bio_desc: I'm  a passionate software developer from nigeria. I'm ready to revolutionize the african tech space
